deity_markdown: [Aesocar](/Deities.aspx?ID=403), [Ashava](/Deities.aspx?ID=466), [Atreia](/Deities.aspx?ID=686), [Bolka](/Deities.aspx?ID=445), [Dalenydra](/Deities.aspx?ID=469), [Immonhiel](/Deities.aspx?ID=626), [Isis](/Deities.aspx?ID=517), [Kofusachi](/Deities.aspx?ID=309), [Korada](/Deities.aspx?ID=475), [Mother Vulture](/Deities.aspx?ID=542), [Mrtyu](/Deities.aspx?ID=543), [Myr](/Deities.aspx?ID=408), [Naderi](/Deities.aspx?ID=627), [Osiris](/Deities.aspx?ID=520), [Phi Deva](/Deities.aspx?ID=301), [Qi Zhong](/Deities.aspx?ID=314), [Selket](/Deities.aspx?ID=640), [The Lost Prince](/Deities.aspx?ID=456), [The Offering Plate](/Deities.aspx?ID=254), [Tlehar](/Deities.aspx?ID=681), [Touch of the Sun](/Deities.aspx?ID=233), [Tsukiyo](/Deities.aspx?ID=317), [Wards of the Pharaoh](/Deities.aspx?ID=208)
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=1678)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 357 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Tradition**
[Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Aesocar](/Deities.aspx?ID=403), [Ashava](/Deities.aspx?ID=466), [Atreia](/Deities.aspx?ID=686), [Bolka](/Deities.aspx?ID=445), [Dalenydra](/Deities.aspx?ID=469), [Immonhiel](/Deities.aspx?ID=626), [Isis](/Deities.aspx?ID=517), [Kofusachi](/Deities.aspx?ID=309), [Korada](/Deities.aspx?ID=475), [Mother Vulture](/Deities.aspx?ID=542), [Mrtyu](/Deities.aspx?ID=543), [Myr](/Deities.aspx?ID=408), [Naderi](/Deities.aspx?ID=627), [Osiris](/Deities.aspx?ID=520), [Phi Deva](/Deities.aspx?ID=301), [Qi Zhong](/Deities.aspx?ID=314), [Selket](/Deities.aspx?ID=640), [The Lost Prince](/Deities.aspx?ID=456), [The Offering Plate](/Deities.aspx?ID=254), [Tlehar](/Deities.aspx?ID=681), [Touch of the Sun](/Deities.aspx?ID=233), [Tsukiyo](/Deities.aspx?ID=317), [Wards of the Pharaoh](/Deities.aspx?ID=208)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 willing creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You grace the target's mind, boosting its mental defenses and healing its wounds. The target regains 1d10+4 Hit Points when you Cast the Spell and gains a +2 status bonus to saves against [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effects for the duration.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The amount of healing increases by 1d10+4.
name: Soothe

summary: Heal the target and bolster them against mental attacks.

text: Soothe Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 357 2.0 Tradition Occult Deities Aesocar, Ashava, Atreia, Bolka, Dalenydra, Immonhiel, Isis, Kofusachi, Korada, Mother Vulture, Mrtyu, Myr, Naderi, Osiris, Phi Deva, Qi Zhong, Selket, The Lost Prince, The Offering Plate, Tlehar, Touch of the Sun, Tsukiyo, Wards of the Pharaoh Range 30 feet Target 1 willing creature Duration 1 minute --- You grace the target's mind, boosting its mental defenses and healing its wounds. The target regains 1d10+4 Hit Points when you Cast the Spell and gains a +2 status bonus to saves against mental effects for the duration. --- Heightened (+1) The amount of healing increases by 1d10+4.
